channel.title: Omfg server help
channel.description:
i need help putting a good server online i want to have it for me and friends to play on and make it a little public
i dont really understand the threads on how to, i dont have a router... i dont know how to port forward

item.title: Omfg server help
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

Most likely the same way
Start > search “run” > click run > type cmd > netsh firewall add portopening 43594 servername
But the code might be alil different, If it is type
netsh firewall
or
netsh firewall add
Something like that…

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg server help
item.dc:creator: @mandood77 mandood77
item.description:
@mandood77 wrote:

[quote=“I need a username, post:5, topic:301983”]There are alot of tutorials on How to portforward But I would go
start > run > cmd
and type:
netsh firewall add portopening 43594 servernamehere
(that opens port 43594 with the name servernamehere)
Then to get pplz online
you can ether:
Download no-ip, google it
install it
www.whatsmyip.org
Get your ip
Add it to no-ip, google it,
and then Tell your friends (or anyone) Your no-ip IP
EG:
servername.No-ip.biz
OR you can just goto
www.whatsmyip.org
and tell your friends that # (alil risky, You can do alot with an ip)
Also, Your friends will need to download a client (unless you have a webclient)
Ether download one from here, And edit it, Or just download Project fubergen[/quote] Hi, do you know a way for Vista to do that? Because i want to be able to open that port too!

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg server help
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

There are alot of tutorials on How to portforward But I would go
start > run > cmd
and type:
netsh firewall add portopening 43594 servernamehere
(that opens port 43594 with the name servernamehere)
Then to get pplz online
you can ether:
Download no-ip, google it
install it
www.whatsmyip.org
Get your ip
Add it to no-ip, google it,
and then Tell your friends (or anyone) Your no-ip IP
EG:
servername.No-ip.biz
OR you can just goto
www.whatsmyip.org
and tell your friends that # (alil risky, You can do alot with an ip)
Also, Your friends will need to download a client (unless you have a webclient)
Ether download one from here, And edit it, Or just download Project fubergen

Read full topic

item.title: Omfg server help

Theres a tutorial on how to do it.
Otherwise if you can’t figure it out you will have to use hamachi.
[/quote] Lol Don’t use Hamachi, i Personally think Hamachi sucks so yeah[/quote]

Well if he cant do it, thats the only way he can get people on his server…
